name: The Hospital (Dusty Games)
description:
You play as George Johnson, a 19 year old boy who decided to go and explore. He stumbles upon a nearby abandoned hospital named, Mortem Hospital, which has been closed for years now. You enter but the door mysteriously closes itself, and now... You have no choice, but to explore the mystifying location. But be warned, as THEY will wander these halls, along side you.

(Side Note: This is my first EVER complete game)
